func.title: ShakeFree

param.name: x
param.desc: X center position of the circular area to be shaken free. Always global.

param.name: y
param.desc: Y center position of the circular area to be shaken free. Always global.

param.name: radius
param.desc: Radius of the circular area to be shaken free.

func.desc: Loosens instable material within a circular area. Loosened material will then begin to fall if there is room underneath. This can be used to collapse earth tunnels or similar.

example.text: Shakes the complete landscape. Careful: this might kill you computer ;)
